name: Toverdrive
description:
Toverdrive is a mix between a racing game and a tower defense, made for the Mix'n'Jam Game Jam 2020.

Your Tower is under attack! 

Race against the enemies and grab the power Orbs to regain control of the tower, but be careful: they can do that too.

Use WASD keys to move.

--

Visuals : Tiziana De Stefano (tizideste)

Programming  : Jari Tarabelli (Cancercookie)

Cover image : Ylenia Tarabelli
